name: Grapplebot
description:
Description:

You are a robot with grapple guns for hands with a goal to get to the end of each level as fast as you possibly can. Find creative ways to launch yourself through obstacles and figure out the best path to reach the top of the leaderboards. This game is all about speedrunning, and the process of coming up with your own ways of being the best.

Leaderboard: 

See how you rank amongst other players and strive to be the best!

Controls: 

Keyboard: 

  • 'wasd' to move
  • 'space' to jump
  • 'shift' to run
  • 'q' to switch left hand to gun/grapple (no use yet)
  • 'e' to switch right hand to gun/grapple (no use yet)

Mouse: 

  • left click to shoot left grapple
  • right click to shoot right grapple
Disclaimer: 

This game is still in very early stages with much more content planned. Multiplayer may or may not work depending on my AWS server status (the leaderboard should be much more reliable). 

Feel free to reach out to me about bugs, issues, and suggestions you have with this game. I'd love to hear your feedback :)
